title: hapray Origami Kit for Kids Ages 6-12 10 Year Olds, with Guiding Book, 152 Paper with 72 Patterns, DIY Art and Craft Projects Activity, Beginners Children's Day Gift Childs Boys Girls
features: Kid Origami Kit: Our square origami 152 paper set includes 8 practice sheets and 144 double-sided origami papers featuring 72 unique and vibrant patterns (2 sheets of each design). Each sheet measures 14 x 14 cm (5.5 x 5.5 inches), providing the perfect size for various creative projects. This kit is an excellent starting point for children exploring the world of origami.

Premium Quality Paper: Our origami papers are crafted to provide a smooth folding experience, with durable material that holds creases well, making them ideal for both beginners enthusiasts. Children will enjoy enhancing their fine motor skills and creativity with these colorful papers.

Step-by-Step Tutorial: This kit includes a 96-page instruction book, along with 10 pages dedicated to basic folding techniques. The detailed, step-by-step guidance ensures that users of all skill levels can create beautiful origami pieces, from simple to more complex designs.

Perfect for Crafting Fun: Ideal for both kids and adults who enjoy DIY projects, this origami set offers endless opportunities for creative expression. Engaging in origami not only nurtures a child's developmental skills but also provides a fun and educational activity for the entire family.

Customer Care: We are committed to providing excellent customer service. If you have any questions or need assistance, please feel free to contact us, and we'll provide a satisfactory solution within 24 hours.
description: Product Description HAPRAY We are committed to being a pioneer in the creative arts industry for children.Accompany your baby's growth with you. Package Included： 144 sheets of origami paper+8 sheets of practice papers; 96-page Instructional origami book; Origami paper size: 5.5 x 5.5 inch (14x14 cm) 8 Sheets Of Pure Practice Papers Included As the previous pages of guiding book shows, in case of you need, we offer you some practice papers to learn and practice the “Folding Skill” , “Triangle Folding”, “Square Folding”, “Single Rhombus Folding”, “Double Diamond Folding” (these are basic folding skill, and we need to use in the origami kit). 72 Sheets Of Colorful Vivid Project & High-quality Square Origami Paper Firstly, we provide double-sided colorful origami, so parents can play with kids to finish these origami, it will be a funny, full fill love and meaningful time. Secondly, it's also suitable for teacher and students to play together in funny craft class, or suit for kids to share to their friends. 96-Page Guiding Book For Beginners Easy to use with detailed step-by-step instructions 6 pages for basic folding skill included in the origami book. How to use the guiding book? -Each origami have the relative number and name, and you can find the same page number in the guiding book and start to create your craft. Tips: Suit for kids (aged 5+), and parents are advised to accompany with children. Colorful Printing Each origami paper is colorful printed, make your origami paper craft more vivid and lively. Smooth Surface This origami kit for kids is made of 128g coated paper, which has a smooth surface and won’t be torn easily and curl at edges, also no peculiar smell and any harmful or toxic substances to human’s body or to environment. Creativity Try to create your Origami world!
